instructions.name: bulk_move_to_map
docs: Bulk move heroes to map (multiple heroes in single transaction)

instructions.name: bulk_place_heroes
docs: Bulk place heroes on grid (multiple heroes in single transaction)

instructions.name: buy_hero
docs: Buy heroes in bulk (1-10 at once, costs 100 coins per hero, applies burn split)

instructions.name: claim_rewards
docs: Claim mining rewards with time-based calculation and referral bonuses

instructions.name: get_grid_state
docs: Get grid state with all tiles

instructions.name: get_hero_details
docs: Get detailed hero info by index

instructions.name: initialize_global_state
docs: Initialize the global game state with dynamic configuration (admin only, one-time)

instructions.name: move_hero_to_map
docs: Move hero from grid to map (start mining)

instructions.name: pending_rewards
docs: Calculate pending rewards without claiming (read-only simulation)

instructions.name: place_hero_on_grid
docs: Place hero on grid at specific coordinates with optional restroom flag

instructions.name: purchase_initial_house
docs: Purchase initial house (entry fee with dynamic SOL price)

instructions.name: recover_hp
docs: Recover HP for heroes on grid (location-based multipliers: bench 1x, restroom 3x)

instructions.name: remove_hero_from_grid
docs: Remove hero from grid at specific coordinates

instructions.name: set_referrer
docs: Set referrer for a user (can only be set once)

instructions.name: start_game
docs: Start the game (admin only, can only be called once)

instructions.name: upgrade_house
docs: Upgrade house to next level (expands grid, costs coins, has cooldown)

instructions.name: withdraw_token_funds
docs: Withdraw SPL tokens from contract PDA to treasury (admin only)

errors.name: HeroIsSleeping
errors.msg: Hero is sleeping (HP = 0), must recover first

errors.name: HeroAlreadyOnMap
errors.msg: Hero is already on the map

errors.name: HouseNotInitialized
errors.msg: House not initialized - purchase initial house first

errors.name: HeroNotOnGrid
errors.msg: Hero is not on the grid

errors.name: UpgradeCooldownActive
errors.msg: House upgrade cooldown is still active

errors.name: HeroNotInRestroom
errors.msg: Hero is not in a restroom

types.name: GlobalState
docs: Global game state - singleton PDA with dynamic configuration

fields.name: total_hash_power
docs: Total hash power (sum of all active players' power)

fields.name: initial_house_price
docs: Initial house purchase price (SOL, in lamports)

fields.name: initial_bombcoin_per_block
docs: Base reward rate (BOMBcoin per hour at phase 1)

fields.name: halving_interval
docs: Halving interval (supply milestone for rate reduction)

fields.name: total_burned
docs: Total coins burned from hero minting

fields.name: rarity
docs: Hero rarity (determines stats and drop rate)

fields.name: speed
docs: Speed stat (affects HMP and HP drain)

fields.name: bomb_number
docs: Bomb count (multiplier for power and HP drain)

types.name: HeroRarity
docs: Hero rarity tiers (affects drop rates and stat ranges)

types.name: HouseTile
docs: House tile in the grid (each position can contain a hero)

fields.name: is_restroom
docs: Is this tile a restroom (boosted recovery)?

types.name: UserAccount
docs: Per-player account - stores all game state for one user

fields.name: last_house_upgrade_timestamp
docs: Timestamp of last house upgrade (for cooldown)

fields.name: grid_width
docs: Grid dimensions based on house level

fields.name: house_occupied_coords
docs: Vector of occupied tiles with coordinates and hero IDs

fields.name: player_power
docs: Total mining power (cached sum of active heroes' HMP)

fields.name: last_reward_block
docs: Last block when rewards were claimed

fields.name: referrer
docs: Referrer wallet (can only be set once)

fields.name: referrals
docs: List of users referred by this player
